description.narrative: Since May 2020, Oxfam has partnered with the Consultative Institute for Socio-Economic Development of Rural and Mountainous Areas (CISDOMA) to assist VRG in developing a Guidelines on community engagement. The hand book compiled by CISDOMA, in collaboration with VRG, which in line with VRG's sustainable development strategy, meeting the requirements of sustainable forest management in accordance with the regulations on sustainable forest management in Vietnam and compatible with International Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certification requirements. After being tested in field situation, the hand book was positively received by VRG’s staff involved and the leaders. In this phase, in order to facilitate the rolling out the handbook into practice, theproject will further enhancecommunity engagement activities in sustainable forest management processes, and to contribute to the sustainable development orientation of VRG. The pilot roll-out activities will be conducted at Phu Rieng Rubber Company withexpected results as follows: - Improved SFM plan of Phu Rieng RC company with better integration of community engagement guidance and requirements. - Enhanced skills and techniques of Phu Rieng RC staff on community engagement. - Enhanced knowledge VRG headquarter (Department of Sustainable Development) and VRG affiliate companies in Vietnam on how to deploy the Community Engagement Guidelines in their works.
